info.author: Richard Jones
info.description:
The integration includes:

1. Commits to a Subversion repository should be able to optionally attach
   the commit message to a Roundup issue and further be able to affect the
   issue's status.
2. Within Roundup, the Subversion commit information (log message, revision
   number) will be stored and displayed usefully.
3. Roundup's web interface will provide a link to revision information,
   either directly or linking back into the Subversion repository in the
   form of a 3rd-party web interface.
info.name: svn-roundup
info.html_description:
The integration includes:

  1. Commits to a Subversion repository should be able to optionally attach the commit message to a Roundup issue and further be able to affect the issue’s status.
  2. Within Roundup, the Subversion commit information (log message, revision number) will be stored and displayed usefully.
  3. Roundup’s web interface will provide a link to revision information, either directly or linking back into the Subversion repository in the form of a 3rd-party web interface.
